text.div:
ResponseToNeoadjuvantTherapy

A code that indicates the response to neoadjuvant therapy

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/neoadjuvant-therapy, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
no_prior_treatment No prior treatment
grade_0 Grade 0 (complete response) No viable cancer cells
grade_1 Grade 1 (moderate response) Single cells or small groups of cancer cells
grade_2 Grade 2 (minimal response) Residual cancer outgrown by fibrosis
grade_3 Grade 3 (poor response) Minimal or no tumour kill; extensive residual cancer.

name: ResponseToNeoadjuvantTherapy
description: A code that indicates the response to neoadjuvant therapy
